title: Kyrgyzstan Disputes U.S. Bankruptcy Filing by Centerra Gold-Mining Units
sub_head: Centerra sought chapter 11 protection for its Kumtor units over clashes with the Central Asian republic
body:
Kyrgyzstan will challenge the U.S. bankruptcy filings of Centerra Gold Inc.’s Kumtor gold operations, a lawyer for the Central Asian republic said after it took control of the mining project from the company.
The Kyrgyz Republic disputes Centerra’s Kumtor mining units have the legal authority to file for chapter 11 protection, the country’s lawyer Benjamin Mintz said Tuesday at a hearing in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in New York.
Toronto-based...
